select.if: SELECT NUM,TITLE,CONTENT,READ_COUNT,WRITE_DATE,REPLY FROM( SELECT a.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY NUM DESC) zNUM FROM (SELECT A.NUM, A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, A.READ_COUNT, A.WRITE_DATE, NVL(B.REPLYCOUNT,0) AS REPLY FROM TB_BOARD A , (SELECT C.BNO,COUNT(*) AS REPLYCOUNT FROM BBS_COMMENT C GROUP BY BNO) B WHERE A.NUM = B.BNO(+)) a )X WHERE X.zNUM BETWEEN #{nowPage} and 10
